mapper.select: select * from address where user_id=(select id from user where username=#{username})
mapper.insert: insert into address(id,address,name,phone,user_id,status,create_time,update_time) values(MD5(UUID()),#{address},#{name},#{phone},(select id from user where username=#{username}),0,now(),now())
mapper.update: update address set status=0 where status=1;update address set status=1 where id=#{id};
